programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Matty sends the team to Ghana to recover a hard drive from an e-waste landfill that is run by a powerful and violent man, leading them to speculate about what could be on the device.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: An Irish military intelligence officer claims to know the whereabouts of a lethal bomb maker whom Mac has been hunting for years.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When a vial containing a deadly virus is stolen from the Center for Disease Control in Atlanta, MacGvyer and team race to recover it before the thief unleashes a global pandemic.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Matty reveals the shocking secret that her husband has been undercover in a criminal organization for eight years; when his status as a CIA agent comes out, Matty needs MacGyver to find and extract her husband before it's too late.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack's mini-vacation is cut short when someone from their past abducts them and locks them in a concrete room; Matty tasks Riley, Bozer and Leanna with stealing a diamond encoded with terrorist intelligence from a princess in Milan.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates the death of a neighborhood watch group member revealing a dark quest for control.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Winter investigate the death of a star cricketer during a tournament, but could the dislike of a cricket format really be the motive for murder?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates the death of an elderly woman who witnessed a shocking event.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Barnaby (John Nettles) is called in to investigate when an accomplished author is suspected in the brutal murder of a local writers club's secretary. With Daniel Casey, Jane Wymark and Laura Howard.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A real razor is substituted for a fake one in a drama group's production of "Amadeus," resulting in the death of an actor.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Residents of the village of Morton Fendle invest in the local craft center, boosting community spirit; Barnaby investigates after the wife of the center's owner disappears and a neighbour is killed.

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: After following Moreau to San Lorenzo, the team discovers that he is chief advisor to the current President.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: When the team comes together to help Sophie, they intercept guilt-ridden corporate fixer Harry and decide to help him take down an evil billionaire making money on the back of an opioid crisis.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: With a new team member on board, plus the arrival of Hardison's genius foster sister, the team heads to Panama to pull an elaborate heist before an evil billionaire can get his money and flee to a non-extradition country.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.sub-title: The Rollin' on the River Job
programme.desc: The Leverage team takes on a greedy riverboat casino owner, before he can bulldoze the homes of longtime New Orleans natives for his planned expansion.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: One member of the team seeks redemption and justice by convincing Leverage to con a developer out of an entire luxury apartment building.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: When a woman believes she is being haunted, Sophie leads Breanna and Parker through a con to convince the two real estate scammers responsible to target Leverage HQ.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: The Leverage team dives into the world of a fantasy collectible card game with a devoted following to take down a pharmaceutical bad boy who is price-gouging drugs.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption
programme.desc: The team takes on a brilliant software developer who is selling a facial recognition system that threatens everyone's privacy except his own.
